body_html:
@keithyin, to make sure I understand the issue: are you trying to debug runs of the queues, or runs of some other main training ops on the main thread?

Also, model and train_n_iteration seem to be custom (non-tensorflow) class and method. Can you point me to the code so I can see how they use sess?
body_text:
@keithyin, to make sure I understand the issue: are you trying to debug runs of the queues, or runs of some other main training ops on the main thread?
Also, model and train_n_iteration seem to be custom (non-tensorflow) class and method. Can you point me to the code so I can see how they use sess?
body:
@KeithYin, to make sure I understand the issue: are you trying to debug runs of the queues, or runs of some other main training ops on the main thread? 

Also, `model` and `train_n_iteration` seem to be custom (non-tensorflow) class and method. Can you point me to the code so I can see how they use `sess`?
